title: Funeral set for 10-year-old killed in accidental shooting
content:
MARSHALL COUNTY, AL (WAFF) -
A 10-year-old who was killed in an accident shooting will be laid to rest.
Micheal Wooten's funeral will be at 5 p.m. on Thursday, May 26 at McRae Chapel in Boaz.
Visitation will be held on Wednesday, May 25 from 5 p.m to 8 p.m. at the funeral home.
READ MORE: Marshall Co. elementary students receive counseling after classmate's death
The family asks that instead of flowers make donations to the Boaz Rec Center or the Douglas Youth League.
Micheal passed away at his home after an accidental shooting on Friday in the Horton Community. He was a 5th-grade student at Douglas Elementary School.
